Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: I don't often write reviews but I'm writing this review 3 years after my visit because it's worth remembering! I owe it to the lovely owner and her mother for their delicious meatballs and hospitality. They were so kind and shared stories ‚Ä¶

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
Owner was really friendly, and the food was great too! Tried the stamppot and grandma's meatball combo, as well as the spicy meatball.
Personally really enjoyed the spicy meatball!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
Great food.
Great quality/price.
A bargain

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
It's difficult to imagine that I would have once rated 5 star a little shack serving meatballs !!
But it REALLY deserves it ! ‚Ä¶

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: <FROM KOREA>The owner of this house is very friendly and nice. We had a best meatball here, you order meatball and mashedpotato seperately. Mashed potatoes are also really good, all with reasonable price. They bring beer from the bar beside it.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: The food was great. I had the Grandma's Meatball and the carrot/potato mash. Definitely a hidden gem of Amsterdam with really friendly staff.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Great place to eat meatballs :) Reasonable price. Very recommended the spicy meatball, although baby balls were a bit too dry for me

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: A beautiful place for taste dutch food (Stampott), kind service and good beers. For repeat. Rep+++++

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: A cozy petit restaurant run by attentive cook Merlyn & her sister. They serve tasty handmade boerenkool, zuurkool, hutspot and a meatball, with sju on the Wallen!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
Good food, friendly staff, cheap
prices. I totally recommend this place.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Just like it says on the sign: the best in town üëåreally enjoyed my lunch at this place, service is excellent!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: I travel to Amsterdam a lot, and have somehow missed this place. The food is simple but yet beautiful. Tender meatballs packed with flavor. The energy from the front of house was lovely and we felt welcome. Love it all!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Lovely fresh typical Dutch food. Limited room but they also serve food in the pub in the corner (to be frank, the pub terrace is a nicer space to eat). Very reasonable prices and friendly staff. They close at 8:00 pm so be there early to have a nice dinner!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Very small place, OK for a quick bite. Feels like home there.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: OMG! This was one of the best places we ate in Amsterdam! I highly recommend. There is a sweet lady that will explain the menu thoroughly. If there's not enough seating you can sit at her sisters bar with your food 2 doors down.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Amazing staff! They were so kind and friendly. The place is cosy and the food is so tasty. I didn't like meatballs before going to this place, we were hungry and tired so the first place we found to eat was mr meatball, and since then I fell in love with their meatballs.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
This spot has delicious traditional Dutch food that is filling. The owner/chef is a wonderful woman from Dutch speaking South America. The conversation was great and I leaned a bit more about the area.
Highly recommended for good food and good people.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Grandma's Meatball and Beetroot Mash was absolutely amazing! The gravy, the meatball were perfection. The mash fantastic as well and she was very accommodating to my wifes dairy allergy. Would definitely go back for more the next time I'm around.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
Very good food, but they didn't have much variety.
The girl serving was obviously new, as the owner was still explaining to her how to do everything, so that may have delayed our order a little, but the result was very good.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: I‚Äôm still here - I just finished and I‚Äôm in a hurry to let the world know that this was the best meatball I‚Äôve ever had in my life. My Italian ancestors know nothing, the lady running this shop has a secret recipe that should be sent out on the next Voyager probe.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Delicious, yummy, homely. If you're looking for a top place to chow down that has a cozy feel, this is your go to place. Located in a convenient location, not far from Amsterdam Centraal, this family run business creates the most succulent ‚Ä¶

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Everything was great, warm and welcoming! The atmosphere feels very much like home and we were comfortable as soon as we sat down. Very good experience!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant for lunch! In a small place but confortable and homely. The best meatball in Amsterdam! The cooker is nice and patient.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: The best quality food in Amsterdam at a great price. Go there and I bet that you'll enjoy having a chat with the owner while devouring your meal. I personally tried the roti and I kindly recommend it.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Delicious meatballs served with a various mashed potatoes. Staff is friendly and helpful. The place is small but you can order food from nearby pub.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: I usually don‚Äôt like meatballs but these were absolutely delicious. The owner is incredible charming too. 11/10 would come back here again!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
Amazing place. My first taste of traditional Dutch food and did not diaspoint.
Cosy and relaxed environment too. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: The lady was very nice and lovely. Meatballs were well done and tasty. Good value of money

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
Lovely and surprising food ! traditionnal meatballs with mash and topping, the owner is very kind and helpfull !
I definitely suggest this little restaurant in amsterdam.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: I higly recommend this place. Best meatball that I have ever eaten!!!! And service here is really great. I ate meatball and potatoes he tecommended and it was tasty. If you stay near Centraal,  visit here

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Really good dutch food

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Yummy meatballs. Very personal service. Good price for the food you get ;) I definitely recommend this place.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Omg so healthy and delicious food that l ate in Amsterdam. And l like the owner mama too much. Small but lovely restaurant.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Probably one of the best meatballs i've ever had, really enjoyed the meal!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Cosy small place with three table, lovely lady behind the counter and the smell and taste is great!  Do recommend this place.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Meatball and mash potatos are little bit salty - probably how local taste. Nevertheless, very friendly owner that does everything by herself!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text:
I'm really glad to go to the Mister Meatball.
That was the best Dutch food ever... and with excellent service.
I really appreciated.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Yum food. Expensive for what it is. Flies all over. Not what it looks like on pic. V small. Owner is nice

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Staff is very nice and accommodating. Plus the food is very tasty and typical for the area. 5 Stars

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: The dish is good and simple, nothing spectacular. The place is really small. The service is good.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Food was  made fresh.the nicest pizza I have ever eaten .clean warm friendly staff.ideal for family and friends.wont be disappointed.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Fantastic meal!  Such amazing and attentive staff!  Highly recommended!

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Meatballs where amazing, i highly recommend the Mister Meatball Family Meal so you can taste all the mash potatoes.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Nice sandwiches. You also can order drinks from the bar next to the Mister Meatball

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Good food and friendly service. Quite small so make sure you book.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Really distinctive place. You have to try for increased experience. Vefy tasty meatballs and smoked sausages.

Name: Mister Meatball
Review Text: Phenomenal tasting food! Lovely service and a cosy atmosphere.

Review Text: Nice little place with friendly stuff and very tasty meatballs.

Review Text: Absolutely delicious food, great service too.

Review Text: Tasty grand-ma meatballs with a warm welcome. We recommend it!
